title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: When previewing the series, there is no friendly error message displayed if there is no data available.
EB: A friendly error message should be displayed when previewing a series with no available data.
SR:
1. Open the series preview.
2. Ensure that there is no data available for the series.
3. Check if a friendly error message is displayed.
